item.title: Film makers guide
item.description:
Film makers guide

Many people that want to get into filmmaking believe you need to attend film school to have a successful career. Many also believe that by purchasing a Red Epic Camera you will instantly become a filmmaker. Neither are true. After watching Casey Neistat's Guide to Filmmaking video, you learn that gear doesn't matter.

item.title: The State want in on your food pics
item.description:
The State want in on your food pics

It's a Facebook notification you never want to see. The social network is to start warning people when it has a "strong suspicion" that an account has been compromised by a nation-state. Instead of simply resetting a password, Facebook warns that those affected should either "rebuild or replace" their mobile phone or computer system.

item.title: Virgin brings the smart pavement to Chesham
item.description:
Virgin brings the smart pavement to Chesham

Virgin Media has worked with Chiltern District Council to bring superfast Wi-Fi to the streets of Chesham. The unlimited Wi-Fi service is available to residents, businesses and visitors passing through the centre of Chesham. It also includes parts of Lowndes Park - Chesham's 36 acre park space.
